name: TechoPhobe WebGL
description:
Episode 1: Awakening:

(For Bext Experience play full screen or download it.  https://vasantj.itch.io/technophobe)

Meet the Pizza Delivery guy who goes to deliver pizza to an underground AI facility and witnesses the unleashing of an AI who enjoys murder.
